nodes.text: Empire 37: The Wrong Side of the War, Part 2 is the thirty-seventh issue in the Star Wars: Empire series of comics. It was published on November 9, 2005 by Dark Horse Comics.

In his new post as prison guard at the Imperial base on Kalist VI, Lt. Janek Sunber is forced to weigh what he knows he should do against what he can do when he comes up against the corrupt status quo.
But conflict with his fellow officers is just the tip of the iceberg when it comes to challenges facing the young lieutenant. Unbeknownst to the Empire, the Rebels have infiltrated the base!
